それで、話っていうのは？: So, what did you want to talk about?
はい……%usernameusernameuserna%さんにしか\nお願い出来:
Yes... %user name, username, user name, %-san only.
It's something I can't ask of you.
もったいぶった言い方だな。\n俺に出来ることなら協力は惜しまない。遠慮なく話して:
That's a pretty lame way to put it.
If it's something I can do, I'll do whatever I can to help. Don't hesitate to tell me.
では……生徒会長と話をする場を、設けてはいただけませんか？: Then... could you set up a place for me to talk to the student council president?
生徒会長と？ 確かに俺は生徒会所属ではあるから、\n相談することはできると思うが:
With the student council president? It's true that I'm a member of the Student Council,
I think we can talk about it... What are you going to talk about?
俺には言えない話か？それとも、言いたくないだけか？: Is it something you can't tell me? Or do you just not want to?
申し訳ございませんが、あなたには関係のない話です。: I'm sorry, but it has nothing to do with you.
言いたくないってことか。: So she doesn't want to say it.
当然だろ？ 俺に関係ないなんて嘘だ。: Isn’t that obvious? It’s a lie to say it’s got nothing to do with me.
きっとその内容は俺やシリウスシュガーのみんなが、\n今ここで聞かないと後悔する類:
I’m sure the contents are something that I and everyone else in Sirius Sugaru
If you don't ask now, you'll regret it.
七彩をいつも見てるからな。\n顔を見れば、俺達に関係ありありなのはすぐわかるよ。:
I'm always looking at Shichisai, after all.
Just by looking at her face, I can tell that it has something to do with us.
だから話せないなら断る。: So if I can't talk, I refuse.
……わかりましたわ。もし頼みを聞いてくださるなら、\n報酬をお支払いしますわ。:
...Understood. If you accept my request,
I'll pay you back.
そういう話じゃない。\n俺が金で動く人間かどうかは、さすがにわかっているだろう？:
That's not what I'm talking about.
Of course you know whether I'm a person who runs on money or not, right?
どうしても……話さないといけませんか？: Do I really have to tell you...?
ああ、むしろひとりで抱え込むなと言いたいくらいだ。: Yeah, if anything, I want to tell her not to take it all on by herself.
生徒会長には、もしシリウスシュガーが負けても退学するのは\nわたくしだけにしてほ:
To the student council president, even if Sirius Sugaru loses, he’ll be expelled
I'm going to ask you to leave me alone.
どうしてそんなことをするんだ？\nカラフルブーケにだって勝てたじゃないか。:
Why would you do that?
You even beat the colorful bouquet, didn't you?
だからこそですわ。先日の模擬戦に勝てたのは、\n%usernameusernam:
That's exactly why we won the mock battle the other day.
%usernameusernameuserna%-san, it's all thanks to you.
それは違う。確かに助言はした。\nだが、あの作戦を考えたのは七彩だろう。:
That's not it. I did give her some advice.
But Shichika was probably the one who came up with that plan.
ええ。ですが、%usernameusernameuserna%さんがわたくし達の:
Yes. However, %usernameusernameuserna%-san are our weaknesses.
It's only possible because you saw through my aptitude and gave me proper guidance.
あなたが来てくださったおかげで、\nシリウスシュガーは強くなったのですわ。:
Thanks to you coming,
Sirius Sugaru has gotten stronger.
……そう言ってもらえるのは正直、嬉しい。だが、だからと言って\n負けたら七彩だけ:
...Honestly, I'm happy to hear that. But that doesn't mean...
If you lose, it doesn't make sense that it's just Shichika's responsibility.
これまでのシリウスシュガーは、チームとして成立していませんでした。\nそれもひと:
Up until now, Sirius Sugaru hadn’t been established as a team.
It was all because of my incompetence as the leader.
今回ではっきりと分かりました。わたくしにはリーダーの資質が\nありません。だから:
This time, I understand clearly. I have the qualities of a leader.
I don't. That's why I want to at least take responsibility.
なるほどな。\nそれで、負けたら七彩だけが退学で済むように交渉すると。:
I see what you mean.
That if she lost, she would negotiate so that only Shichika would be expelled.
はい。他に責任の取りようがありませんから。: Yes. There's no other way to take responsibility.
もしそれで、七彩がいなくなってもチームが存続するとして、\nリーダーの後任は誰が:
If that means that even if Shichika disappears, the team will continue to exist...
Who's going to replace the leader?
言っておくが、俺はリーダーにはなれないぞ。: Just so you know, I can't be the leader.
忘れたのか？ 俺は生徒会付の『教導指揮官』であって、\nシリウスシュガー専属じゃ:
Have you forgotten? I’m the “Instructor Commander” attached to the student council
I’m not Sirius Sugar’s personal servant.
生徒会長の命令があれば、別のチームに付くこともあるだろう。: If the student council president ordered them to, they'd probably end up on another team.
で、では、誰がシリウスシュガーを……: Th-Then who would take Sirius Sugar...?
そりゃあ、お前しかいないだろ。\nシリウスシュガーのリーダーは七彩なんだから。:
Of course you’re the only one here.
The leader of Sirius Sugaru is Shichisai, after all.
で、ですから！ わたくしにはリーダーの資質がないと……！: I-I told you! I have to have the qualities of a leader...!
必死に食い下がる七彩に、\n俺はゆっくりと噛み砕くように言った。:
As Shichika desperately dug in,
I said slowly, as if chewing through it.
何度も言うが、今日の作戦を考えたのは七彩だ。\n昨日だって遅くまで過去のデータを:
As I’ve said many times, Shichika was the one who came up with today’s plan.
You were up late analyzing the past data yesterday, right?
仮にもリーダーですから、そのくらい当然ですわ……: I'm the leader, after all, so that's only natural...
俺が思うに、リーダーに最も必要な資質は『責任感』だ。\nメンバーのことを考え、行:
As far as I’m concerned, the most necessary quality for a leader is a sense of responsibility.
People who can think and act about their members are the best people for a leader.
七彩はそれを持ってる。だから、みんなは七彩を信頼できるし、\nカラフルブーケとも:
Shichika has it. That's why everyone can trust him.
I was able to fight on par with the colorful bouquet.
弱気になるな。七彩に一番足りないものがあるとしたら、そこだ。: Don't be so timid. If there's one thing the seven colors lack the most, it's that.
負けた時の心配より、今は勝つための努力をするべきだ。: Rather than worry about losing, we should put in more effort to win right now.
わたくしたちで勝てるのでしょうか、カオスメイデンに。\n残された時間もあとわずか:
Will we be able to defeat Chaos Maiden?
We don't have much time left...
勝てるのか、じゃない。勝たなくちゃいけないんだ。: I'm not asking if I can win. I have to win.
彼を知り己を知れば百戦殆からず……: If you knew him and knew yourself, you wouldn't have fought a hundred battles...
またソンシとおっしゃる方のお言葉ですの？: Are those words from the person who called you Sonshi again?
ああ。敵と味方をよく知れば、何度戦っても負けることはない。\nそんな意味だった気:
Yeah. As long as you know your enemies and allies well, you won't lose no matter how many times you fight.
I think that's what she meant.
勝てないと思うのは、俺たちがカオスメイデンのことを\n本質的な部分でよく知らない:
The reason I don’t think we’ll win is because we’re worried about Chaos Maiden
It's because I don't really know the essence of it.
お前たちは既に己のことはよく知った。なら、次は敵を知る番だ。: You've already learned a lot about yourself. Now it's your turn to learn more about the enemy.
しかし、敵を知るとは、一体どうやって……: But how do you know the enemy...?
